Reviews.Title: “I stay here for LOCATION and price.”
Reviews.Author: cmarret
Reviews.Content: I typically stay in Hilton chains, so this is a definite step DOWN in quality, but for the price, you should expect this. The main reason why I stay here is because the road it's on connects to the BLUE ROUTE. If you're a local (or you frequent Branson) then you know that the traffic is HORRIBLE on the main strip. If you stay in a location that connects to the back roads of Branson, you will save HOURS of time sitting in traffic. (And if you don't know about the back roads, then do your homework before you go or get a Branson map when you arrive.) So, the location is great. The hotel is not. If you're on a budget, it works. There is an outdoor pool for the kids. You are within a short walk of the Hollywood Wax Museum, The Titanic exhibit and places to eat. You get free breakfast. In Branson, you're not going to spend much time in your hotel room. If you can stand the old hotel with horrible beds for a few nights, then book here. I bear it for the price every time.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible guest service!”
Reviews.Author: Triperoo
Reviews.Content: I was staying in Branson for a friend's wedding. The wedding was in the late afternoon and after driving all day to get there, I knew I would have to shower beforehand. I called the hotel the night before to ensure that I would be able to check in with enough time to get ready for the event. The clerk told me that check-in was at 1:00, but I might be able to get in earlier. I showed up to the hotel at about 11:00 and was told by the desk clerk that she would not know if our room was ready until the room service attendants returned from their lunch break. So, I went to lunch and came back at 12:30. When I returned to ask about the room the hotel manager, Jeremy, was behind the desk with the clerk. I asked again if the room was ready. The desk clerk began to call to housekeeping, when the manager cut her off and rudely told her not to bother because the room service attendants were busy. He didn't even look up from the computer he was typing on, while he very rudely told me that check-in was not until 3:00. I explained my situation, that I needed to be at a wedding in a couple hours and was told the night before I could check in at 1:00. His demeanor was extremely unprofessional and rude throughout the entire conversation. He was not helpful or sympathetic to my situation in any way. And he was wearing tattered jeans and a flannel shirt, not the attire of a competent hotel manager. I ended up sitting in the lobby for an hour and a half until the room was finally ready. The only saving grace was Tammy, the front desk clerk, who was very helpful and polite throughout the ordeal, despite also being treated rudely by the manager. Then to top it all off, the next morning my room was called by the front desk a half hour before check-out, asking if I was going to leave soon! Jeremy, I hope you read this and take to heart that in a hospitality industry, during rough economic times, if you continue treating your guests like they are a bother to you and belittling them, you will be jobless very soon!

Reviews.Title: “Not Worth the Money”
Reviews.Author: Breniam
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 3 nights last week. Hot tubs are STILL not fixed, yet trip advisor and others are still advertising a full breakfast and hot tubs. I seen where the manager answered another reviewer and said he was getting this corrected...obviously not very fast. We went into the office and complained about the mis~advertisement and all we got from the desk clerk was "oh well." Breakfast was a joke, the lady putting it out said she didn't want to mess with it all, so there wasn't much out that day." If she was to lazy to put it out, I can imagine how she cleans up afterward. Bad experience because we payed over what we should have for Branson, expecting a nice hot tub and a good breakfast that would account for the extra money. I don't like being misled,and there were plenty of other guests that felt the same way, I know, we talked to them all out by the pool. Will never go back, they are losing alot of customers doing business this way.

Reviews.Title: “Where to start...”
Reviews.Author: mdcrase
Reviews.Content: I don't even know where to begin. I stayed there last Saturday (07/07/12) and had one of the most unpleasant experiences with a hotel in my life. The Room: The room itself was fine, but seriously outdated. The tv only got about 15 channels, with the worst signal I've seen in 20 years. The Pool/Hot Tubs: As other reviewers noted, the hot tubs are filled with various junk and standing water. The pool was ok, but when a selling point is that you have two hot tubs, and you don't tell customers that when they book their stay, it comes across as extremely shady. Breakfast: One of the reasons we selected this hotel was because their website lists a breakfast in the morning which inluded hot waffles, biscuits and gravy, oatmeal, donuts, cereal, etc. This would allow us to save a few bucks on breakfast Sunday morning. Once we walked down to breakfast, we found that there were NO WAFFLES OR BISCUITS AND GRAVY ANYWHERE. Very disappointed. I could continue but I think you get the picture from there...

Reviews.Title: “Please do not waste your money!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Ffd1430
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure where I should begin our whole experience was horrid!!!! We checked in (my husband, 2 daughters 7&8 and our 18 month son). The rooms are small and not very clean, the beds are worn out and broken down and the towels feel like sand paper. Moving on to the pool and play area there was broken glass all around the play area and on the cement area around the pool also they have 2 out door hot tubs that are non working and are somewhat covered with standing water and junk in them. Our son helped us get locked out of our room so my dear husband went down to the desk to see if he could get a key and the person working the desk was very rude and insisted on his id which he didn't have cause we had just come from the pool and who takes their wallet to swim????? Oh now let's discuss the ice machines, if you can call them that. They do not work properly at all they maybe spit out 5 cubes if you stand there forever, and that was us trying both machines in the building. Also I took my daughters to the pool on sat evening and there were smokers in the pool my kids have allergies and can not be around that, not to mention that it is just rude. Also the tv is junk it buzzes and there are maybe 20 channels. The water in the shower does not get very hot, we had it turned all the way to the hot and it was just right for my son, not for us older ones that I like it a little warmer. In conclusion please dont waste your money there are better places to stay .

Reviews.Title: “good for money”
Reviews.Author: dave f
Reviews.Content: stayed here thru hotwire (21/2)stars three times .paid low to mid forty range each time .hotel ok cleanwise, service has always been good ,breakfast is just ok but it is free so i can deal .good bang for buck

Reviews.Title: “Horrible Experience!!”
Reviews.Author: H G
Reviews.Content: We checked into this hotel around 11:30 p.m. Upon arrival, we were given our keys. Before we walked out, the gentleman dialed the room we were suppose to stay in and someone else answered the phone! How scary would it have been had we walked in on someone else!! Totally dissapointed with the way this was handled. No apology, just asked to give us the keys and assigned another room. Once we were settled, it was after midnight before we fell asleep. We were woken up at 5:00 with a wake-up call, which we never requested. Traveling with 3 others and a baby, this call disturbed everyone and it was difficult to get back to sleep. The next morning, we went to the so-called breakfast. What a joke!! A bunch of cereal and a few donuts. Was again disappointed with what was advertised on the website. I expected something more. If I had known about the breakfast, I would have gladly paid a little more to stay someone that provided more of a breakfast. That evening, we had been out of the room for approximately 3 hours, when we were called by an employee, who said the dog we had was barking. I apologized and told her we would be right there. She immediately accused me of lying about having a dog. She said that when she checked us in, she had asked me point blank if I had a dog and I supposedly told her no. I told her that she hadn't checked me in, it was a gentleman, and said that I wrote on my paper there was a dog during our stay. She continued to yell at me and demanded that I was a liar. This was quite frustrating and on Sunday, when the manager arrived, I explained the situation, and my disappointment for the way I was treated. He merely said "Sorry" and nothing else. I didn't expect anything in return, but more of an apology, instead of a simple one word response would have been nice. This place was a horrible experience and I will never return. I would save the money and stay somewhere else. At least a place that has better customer service and a manager who actually has some people skills.

Reviews.Title: “Howard Johnson Hotel, Branson, Missouri”
Reviews.Author: travelor58
Reviews.Content: I hadn't stayed in a Howard Johnson Hotel for years and was pleasantly surprised with the spacious and clean room, extremely comfortable bed, and the friendly staff. It was very relaxing to sit at the pool at the end of a busy day! I would definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Wont stay here again”
Reviews.Author: karenbryson
Reviews.Content: There were quite a few of us staying, myself, my daughter, my fiancee, his brother and another family that were friends of ours. We ended up leaving early because the room was gross. The beds were hard we couldn't hardly sleep and we had an adjoining room with our fiends but we could hear everything including them passing gas! won't stay here again

Reviews.Title: “Terrible Room”
Reviews.Author: Tammy G
Reviews.Content: This is our 3rd time to visit and possibly the last. The beds were terrible and so hard it would have been more comfortable sleeping on the floor. The carpet is outdated and coming unraveled. Super thin walls. We could hear our neighbor like he was in the same room with us. The only good part of this stay was the ice maker in our section was working so we didn't have to go to the lobby to get ice. Needs to do major updates with paint and carpet to compete with the other hotels in the area or you may loose alot of business.

Reviews.Title: “No room at the Inn”
Reviews.Author: AngelicallyMarried
Reviews.Content: Amenities were in state of repair. If you just stay in your room all will be fine. We slept well although the noise from our neighbors children running the hallways easily echoed through our room. Sheets were clean and good water pressure. We were in company of loved ones so we had a great time. I wont be staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Only one working ice machine?”
Reviews.Author: Richard038
Reviews.Content: My wife and I recently did a "Time Share" trip to Branson. The motel they put us in was the Howard Johnson's. Even though this is an older motel chain, the literature said that this motel had recently been refurbished. So I thought "Okay, we'll do it." If you know anything at all about Branson MO you know that it has very steep hills. Well, this motel is on the side of a mountain. The front desk is on the top and our room was below at a 50 degree plus decline. STEEP STEEP (Check in was after 3 p.m.) We checked in around 4 p.m. and found that they were still cleaning our room. We finally got into our room around 4:30 p.m. The room was clean and nice. The mattresses were very soft. I went to get ice and found out that the only ice machine was up the hill at the front desk. BUMMER. They said that we could get ice there. In the morning we went to take a shower and the adjustment handle came off while I was in the shower. We also found ants swarming in the bathroom sink. We went to the front desk building for the free contential breakfast. It was good but boiled eggs instead of scrambled eggs. White gravy and biscuits, coffee, hot choclate, organge or apple juice, milk, three different cereals, donuts, and hot waffels (sp) with syrup. The lady in charge of the breakfast area is very nice and friendly. When we were leaving, I heard someone tell the front desk people that their phone was still not working and that they had reported it two days ago. I also found out that the maintance people are spread pretty thin because they also work at the Day's Inn. Bottom line: personnel are nice and friendly but there is a limit to what they can do. Rooms are clean and quiet. If something is broke, it is not going to get fixed.

Reviews.Title: “Don't Even Think About Staying Here”
Reviews.Author: Dorothy T
Reviews.Content: We stayed here one night and never again. The room was way out dated. The beds were hard and we had a 19 inch tv looked like it was from the 80's. We only got a few channels and some of them buzzed so bad couldn't watch them. We complained about the tv and nothing was done. The walls are so thin we could hear the people next door as if they were in the same room with us. When we went to bed we could hear the person next door snoring had to turn our air conditioner fan on high and could still hear them snoring. We complained at the desk about us hearing the people talking and snoring and the clerk acted like we have never heard this before. According to the reviews I have read she didn't tell the truth i seen a lot of people complaining about thin walls.

Reviews.Title: “Second time to visit”
Reviews.Author: Interlockinghearts
Reviews.Content: This was our second time to visit and LOVED the first visit, which is what had us return. Unfortunately, the baseball world series was taking place in Branson and the hotel staff was not very accomodating. They put my family of 4 in a 1 bed room. Thank goodness it was a king size, but really one bed for 4 days was a bit much!! When I asked for another room or why they did not place us in a room with two beds, I only received the response that they had nothing available. When asked for towels for the pool...desk clerks were rude. The lady in the breakfast room was sweet as ever!! We love seeing her when we are there...very nice and the friendliest staff member there! We do plan on re-visiting this location and hope to have a better experience like the first time.

Reviews.Title: “NEVER EVER AGAIN”
Reviews.Author: Loey814
Reviews.Content: My husband, friend and I stayed there for two nights. It was terrible!!! There were ants all over, no ice, air conditioning not working and the TV was a joke. The people that worked there were nice and when we complained about the ants, they moved us. I booked this hotel through Travelovcity and this is the first time I have had a problem with a Travelocity hotel! Warning - The pictures are very decieving.

Reviews.Title: “The motel and pool was fine, however you better watch your credit card because they will charge extra.”
Reviews.Author: Janetlynn44161
Reviews.Content: Watch your credit card after your stay because they charged $200.43 to my credit card days after we had been there. They did refund it but be sure to watch your bank account or credit card.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Good Price, Decent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: stacyt67
Reviews.Content: We had 2 rooms booked here for a week. We requested adjoining rooms, but when we arrived were told that they had no rooms close to each other that were Queen rooms. Our 2 rooms were in the same building, however they were on opposite sides and opposite ends of the building. The hotel was nice for the price we paid. It would have been nice to have a microwave and refrigerator in the room. The room was dark and the furniture was worn and dated, but it was clean. The maid service did a good job keeping it clean every day. The hotel is in a great location within walking distance to several attractions and shows. The breakfast was good and the lady made sure everything stayed full. The breakfast area was large and clean. The only thing I was disappointed with was there were no ice machines working in the whole hotel. We had to go to the lobby and get ice out of an ice chest. Also, both hot tubs were broken our whole trip. The pool area was nice and the staff made sure that the pool hours were strictly enforced. Overall, we were very pleased with our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Poor service all the way around...”
Reviews.Author: sambohd29
Reviews.Content: We stayed 3 nights and everything was less than average. The rooms need a major upgrade. We only got 3 channels on an old school 19" color television set. I booked online a room with 1 queen size bed but when we arrived it was dirty and was given a room at the very bottom and back of the property with 2 full size beds. The hot tub was mildly warm at best. The person at the front desk didn't know how to help. When we checked out we got a rude" Ok that's it." Their wasn't any thank you for staying with us or anything alike. Unless you get this hotel for $15 a night you should stay elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “I would not stay again”
Reviews.Author: helmfamily
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very run down. We were first put in building #3, which was awful. The people in the next room kept us up all night fighting. When asked to move the next night to a different room, they did allow that. The room in building #1 was better. There were some ants in both rooms. The breakfast was adequate, but have definetely had better. I would not stay here again. The pool area, however, was great. It had a large pool and 2 hot tubs.

Reviews.Title: “If you want cheap this is the place.”
Reviews.Author: soonergrl14
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed with our stay. We came in at the check in time (when they told us to cone in) and our room wasn't ready so they had to move us to another one. The elevators, POP machines, hot tubes didn't work at all! Came back from a long day of having fun to find our room was never cleaned or no clean towels! The staff was rude, the breakfast lady was very friendly though. Upon arrival they weren't busy at all and they just sat there and chatted and never said hello or anything until I made a scene. When leaving they said "that's it" and turned and walked off! Really? That's right that's it. Were never staying here. The tv is before I was born and I'm 21! Half the channels didn't even work. Rooms smelled as old as the tv! The location is perfect though. That was the only thing good ab it. Will stay somewhere else. Nothing ab this made me want to come back!

Reviews.Title: “Needs updating”
Reviews.Author: jdjw
Reviews.Content: My husband, two boys, and myself stayed at this hotel. First of all the pictures look nothing like the hotel or pool. This whole place needs a major upgrade! Neither of the hot tubs worked. Our air conditioner in our room barely worked. There was never any ice in the ice machines. We requested two extra pillows and they, "had none." When there were plenty of vacant rooms! Our toilet seat was broken and then they decided the day before leaving they were going to finally fix it. Some friends of ours woke up to ants covering their bathroom sink! I would definitely not recommend this hotel to anyone. We definitely will not be staying there again.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible - run from this one!”
Reviews.Author: golady178
Reviews.Content: Arrived to find this property not as it appeared on web. The room had old furniture and horrible mattresses! Room infested with ants, air either too hot or freezing cold, none of the ice machines in 3 buildings were working. The pool tiles looked as though they hadn't been cleaned in a long time and neither of the hot tubs were working. The landscaping was all dead, a piece of broken railing was laying out by the pool - a generally neglected property! This property is within walking distance from many attractions but there are many others nearby that seemed nicer.

Reviews.Title: “Large Pool and Patio”
Reviews.Author: GAL01
Reviews.Content: Our toddlers enjoyed the large shallow sections of the pool. One area was only a foot deep while the other was three feet deep. A pavilion with fans provided a great place to sit poolside, playing games or picnicking. A playground adjoined the pool patio. Bring your own towels since the ones provided by the hotel were scarce. The room was adequate. The carpet seemed very dirty...wear shoes! The bed was comfortable except for the sheets which bunched up. The breakfast selection was broad including waffles, biscuits and gravy, cereal and donuts. It was crowded but there were plenty of tables. For the price this hotel was fine. The staff was friendly and helpful. It is not a three or four star hotel but I would return again.

Reviews.Title: “A perfectly adequate hotel”
Reviews.Author: MegHarney
Reviews.Content: This hotel is cheap and efficient. When we stayed, there were only five rooms available and it showed. The hotel staff looked frazzled upon our arrival, however they were helpful and our room was ready. The room was clean (for the most part--I did find a hair in the shower) and cool (which was important--it was about 100 degrees at midnight). Wallpaper was peeling from the walls. The ice machines were unable to keep up with the heat, so they were purchasing ice and providing it at the main entrance, which was a good distance from most of the hotel rooms. Overall, the hotel was just OK--next time I will likely splurge for a 3 star, but if you are in need of a cheap room, this is a great option. My main problem with the hotel was not with the hotel at all, but with Hotwire. They are the only travel website around that counts this hotel as a 2.5 star, so be wary that when booking the 2.5 star deal through Hotwire, you will not be receiving the Holiday Inn Express or hotel of equal star rating, you will likely pay for this 2 star hotel, which is perfectly adequate, but definitely 2 stars.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: deedafortworth
Reviews.Content: We loved staying here, The price was wonderful on our budget and it was very clean, I don't know why there was any kind of bad reviews on this hotel we almost did not stay here because of the bad review's but it has been so good for us, no its not fancy like your more expensive hotel's but better than your cheap hotels, its on the main strip minutes away from all the show's, The free breakfast was so good!! and the lady in the breakfast room was so so nice, the pool was nice, I wish the beds would have been a little more bigger but it was fine we slept good but they do need to up date them but don't let that hold you back . Every night when we arrived back to our room after being gone all day our room was so nice and clean beds made fresh towles everything was perfect!! They did you great job!!

Reviews.Title: “never again.”
Reviews.Author: stoneyice
Reviews.Content: This hotel room was dark with old bedspreads that were not clean. They had flat sheets and a small mattress pad on the bed. The mattress pad was not clean and the flat sheet did not stay on mattress. We had to call for fitted sheets. The mattresses were old. Furniture was dark. Curtains were hanging off hooks. Bathroom was newer. Sink had sticky substance in it. Worst of all you could hear the people upstairs all night long. We had to use earplugs to sleep. We contacted office several times that night but nothing was done. We were going to stay longer then our reservation but we could not get out there fast enough.

Reviews.Title: “Had a great time”
Reviews.Author: jickeyboy
Reviews.Content: As soon as we arrived, we had car trouble and the manager, Eric Shina, came to our rescue with tools and assistance. Helped by removing the battery and taking me to a parts store to purchase a new one. It was extremely hot and he took the time and effort to help us. We are greatly appreciative. The staff was also very helpful and considerate. The motel room was very nice and clean. We had a great three day stay. Also it was the first time for us to take our dog with us. It worked out worderfully!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: averyln
Reviews.Content: After receiving the name of the hotel from Hotwire, I immediately checked the reviews online. As you can imagine I was more than a little concerned about all of the negative reviews. As was stated in a previous review, you have to wonder if two different hotels are being reviewed, or if people are just incredibly fussy about their sub $50 per night accommodations. Folks, there is one "nice" hotel in the area, and it is attached to the convention center. Otherwise, regardless of where you stay you get the same basic two bed box with a bathroom. We are entering our fourth day at the property, and couldn't be happier. While the decor might be a bit dated, you cannot beat the value. The pool is as clean as the one in my backyard, no lines for the breakfast, and the room was very clean. The beds and bedding are clean and adequate (and each has four pillows). Both of our beds are doubles, I would prefer queens but again, we are receiving what we payed for. We are staying in a room facing the lobby building, a location I would recommend for convience and to minimize the hill climb. If you are looking for clean comfortable place to stay at a great value this is it. If you require designer furnishings and linens then head for the landing area.

Reviews.Title: “Nice to stay but breakfast line sucks and won't show in GPS.”
Reviews.Author: VijGuy
Reviews.Content: This is an overall a good hotel. But the breakfast line is too long and that room is too crowded in the morning for breakfast. Also, it's very hilly so may not be suitable for elderly people at all. The bed and linen were average and spring box was sinking, you can bear it for a night. Cleanlinesswise it's a five star and bathroom was also good but without a rug. In your GPS, please make sure that you enter the intersection of Hwy 76 and Francist st so that you don't run into crawling traffic. The '3027 Hwy 76, Branson, MO' shows up in GPS and that's not where you'd want to go, it'a altogether a different destination possibly.

Reviews.Title: “Not so great”
Reviews.Author: nancynurse99
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff was very friendly, but that is about the only positive thing I can say right now. That and the hotel is in a great location to see all of the shows. Our room seemed pretty old and outdated. We didn't have fitted sheets on the bed. They used flat sheets tucked underneath the old mattress instead. When I went to get a shower, I was greeted by a large spider in its web in the bottom corner of the tub. Also found a live silverfish crawling in the bed the next morning. I believe and exterminator would be in order for this place. The website claims that the rooms have been recently remodeled, which I would have to question. There are several seperate buildings which make up this hotel, possibly the one I stayed in hadn't been remodeled yet. It was on the backside of the property. The tv was old, and made a buzzing sound when turned on. It was difficult to hear the actual tv program due to the buzzing sound.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel was the only thing that ruined our branson trip”
Reviews.Author: Lillylove11
Reviews.Content: First of all if you are going to chance this hotel go to www.travelbuddy.com and print the 49 dollar a night stay coupon. You wont want to pay more than that for your stay. Here are the positives... The breakfast was always good every morning and there weren't long lines of people in your way for waffles or food, etc... there was a big selection of food. If you do stay ask to stay in the first building across from the lobby and stay at the FRONT side of that building or your view sucks. Your just staring at buildings otherwise and walking to the strip will be impossible because the hill to the other buildings is tremendous. Negatives... our toilet broke the first time we sat on it so for half the trip the seat would slide off when trying to use it. They later fixed it. The rooms are quite small and the beds are made Ill give them that. However, carpets are stained and dreary, the walls of our bathroom were stained, there was mold on the bathroom wall by the shower, not what you want to see first thing in the a,m. It doesn't get you pumped up for the day. Next, the pools were broken. The main pool was freezing, which works great during the day when its torching hot but at night no one wants to go back frozen. All the pools were actually dirty though. There were bugs in them and then some kids thought it was funny to throw trash from the cans into them so it was pretty filthy. Instead of swimming there we paid thirty bux for wristbands to get into the watermark at another hotel. The hot tub lights didn't work either so at night you could slip in there as the pool area is not lit. Lastly, while we stayed there were two basketball teams there who engulfed the place. They were screaming, running rampant, and playing rock music louder than a live concert. We have two babies, NOT working for sleep. I think hotels should tell you if they have bookings of large groups of wild teenagers. All in all, we tried to get another hotel while we were there but could find one available. Every night after awesome shows we had to come back to this. We have come to branson for fourteen years. Don't ruin your trip. Find another place.

Reviews.Title: “We Loved our Stay and we will return”
Reviews.Author: sun678shine
Reviews.Content: We spent 8 nights at Howard Johnson Hotel, Branson, Missouri. Rooms were clean, staff was very friendly. The breakfast was great. We especially enjoyed Anthony Stacy, Front Office Manager, Jean the Breakfast Person, and also one night auditor person, a lady who was new but didn't get her name. Would recommend Howard Johnson Branson to all who are visiting Branson..... Excellent

Reviews.Title: “Stay Away”
Reviews.Author: Mustangz
Reviews.Content: Got to my hotel in Branson , MO. first thing was they tried to charge my credit card for 45 days and changing that required a Managers intervention. Then had to pay an additional $10 per day for a apartment sized fridge which is totally unreasonable. Then, like the reviewer below I got to the room, and there was no telephone service, no internet service. To top it off the room had numerous bugs in it and the Soda machine outside was out of order. They have limited smoking rooms that have an semblance of internet access. While the staff appears friendly I had to cancel a 30(+) day reservation

Reviews.Title: “The absolute worst”
Reviews.Author: Kimsen
Reviews.Content: Got to my hotel in Branson , MO. first thing was they tried to charge my credit card for 30 days. The max by law allowable is 10 days. How could they not know this? Second, got to the room, and there was no telephone service, no internet service. I was on business, these were needed things, that were "advertised" by this hotel. Went to the front desk to inquire about no telephone and no internet, and on the way out of my room, there was a coke machine....with a "not working" sign on it. Staff was very very rude. They informed me that there was no telephone or internet as it had been knocked out by lightning some 3 weeks prior. That really pissed me off. They should of told me this when making my reservations. Asked to speak to the manager, and she was polite, but said there was "nothing she could do" but to move me into the main building, but that room also had no telephone or internet, either. I told them to cancel my reservation as I would be leaving this hotel next morning. Know what's really cheap? My room didn't even have an alarm clock in it, and the TV was a very old tube TV that when turned on only half the picture was there. And they also "advertised" a small refrigerator in the rooms, but there was none. That's would have been an extra 15.00 per night fee. My travel service contacted the hotel and they did refund my nights stay. Never again will I stay there, and I intend to let everybody I know about this place.

Reviews.Title: “Nice location”
Reviews.Author: Interlockinghearts
Reviews.Content: The location of this hotel was nice. Walking distance if you want to get out and walk. Disappointed that the ice makers were broken. Could not locate one that would work. Other than that, the rooms were clean. The breakfast was wonderful...GREAT lady attending to the guests. She was SUPER and should get a raise for handling everyone in such a friendly manner!! We were impressed with her friendly attitude and willingness to help everyone out. I know she is not the waitress, but she sure enjoys helping others! Great job for having such a great employee!!

Reviews.Title: “Not like any other!”
Reviews.Author: nancysgalleryg
Reviews.Content: My husband and I are in branson at least once a month and Howard Johnson is our first choice every time. We always travel with our beloved dogs Prince and Callie and they are welcomed as if they are part of the family. As any pet owner knows it is hard to find a pet friendly hotel any where you want to go anymore. I am positive that you and anyone you know will feel welcome and have a great stay at this hotel! Be sure to ask for Anthony and he will put you in the right hands!!

Reviews.Title: “Everyone should stay in this beautiful, relaxing, spacious suite!”
Reviews.Author: SheilaShawWatonga_OK
Reviews.Content: Upon arrival, the front desk realized we were spending our 24th Wedding Anniversary weekend with them. After Receptionist Tammie Powers made a quick telephone call to Manager Hunter Jones, they offered us the opportunity to upgrade our reservation to the suite. We are so glad we did! The suite is large, comfortable, and easy access to parking. Being on the upper floor, there is a beautiful view overlooking Branson's hillsides. The king size bed is one you can sleep your life away in. And the jacuzzi bathtub will relax you to a point of calm and comfort that will wash away all stress. Not to mention the octagonal window view while showering. We also appreciated having plenty of countertop, dresser, and closet space in the bedroom. The kitchenette, dining area, and living room made you feel right at home. After touring the local wineries, we were able to chill our wine in the drink refrigerator, while keeping our food in the larger refrigerator. And the room service was very happy to meet our schedule, attentive to when we were leaving for the day, and making sure everything was ready upon our return. The hot continental breakfast was excellent and the sweet lady organizing breakfast made sure there was plenty for everyone. Thank you Hunter and Tammie for making our 24th Wedding Anniversary such a memorable experience!

Reviews.Title: “Very basic, somewhat shabby rooms”
Reviews.Author: utexonah
Reviews.Content: There seems to be two totally different hotels based on the reviews--perhaps they are updating rooms and some people get new rooms, and some, like us, get old ones. This difference was also noted in the lobby and breakfast area. The lobby was very nice and had that quality carried over into the rooms, we would have been satisfied. We were not impressed with our room. All of the furniture and fixtures were old and dated. We pulled back blankets to check mattresses and found them to be ripped up and coming apart at the seams, and lots of debris around the edges. The beds were old, and very uncomfortable. The bedding was worn, and the blanket under the comforter was all pilled and lumpy. The bathrooms seemed fairly clean, though the carpet, especially around the beds were not well vacuumed. The breakfast was fairly basic with the addition of waffles, and biscuits and gravy. The location is off the main strip. Convenient for getting around. I would not stay here again,.

Reviews.Title: “The Hotel made all the difference in my trip”
Reviews.Author: canmakerw
Reviews.Content: I really enjoyed staying at Howard Johnsons. It was very clean and had everything I needed. I really needed some down time and stayed alot in my room so it was very important to have a nice clean room and everything I needed in there. The people working there was very friendly and very helpful. I really enjoyed just talking with them while I was there. The food was very good. The best gravy I've ever eaten. It was all good. I don't have anything bad to say about it. Thank You so much!! Helen Lowe

Reviews.Title: “Great value for low price”
Reviews.Author: ThreeHeartsFarm
Reviews.Content: We booked this through Hotwire and it was our best hotel value on a weeklong odyssey through the south. Rooms not fancy but was clean and comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “BETTER than I expected from a 2-star hotel”
Reviews.Author: spinegirly
Reviews.Content: We stayed the night on Friday, January 29, 2011. I was able to book this hotel on priceline for super cheap. We were arriving around 9:30ish and I knew the hotel lobby closed at 9:00 so we called ahead and the night clerk John let us know that he would leave our room keys in an envelope taped to the front door. We pulled up and grabbed our envelope (there was another envelope waiting for someone else as well). After I had booked our room I called to see if I could request a king size bed...I was told no problem and it wasn't! The only thing I didn't like was that a huge truck with several cars had parked in the parking spots by our room and it wasn't well lit. So we had to park our car on the opposite side of our room so it could be in a well lit parking lot. Our room was CLEAN CLEAN CLEAN. Compared to some of the newer hotels the bedding was a bit dated but the king size bed was FABULOUS! The bathroom was super clean and we had more than enough towels. Because the hotel is about 1 block off Hwy 76 it was very quiet which we LOVED! Again compared to the newer hotels the room was bit dated - probably 1990's. The next morning we got up and went to the contintental breakfast which consisted of waffles, cereal, fruit and juice (and maybe more than I just overlooked) and checked out. The gentlemen at the front desk could not have been nicer. All in all we were really happy with our choice and would not hesitate to stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Don't pay these people cash!”
Reviews.Author: hankins5
Reviews.Content: I usually use a credit card when staying out of town, but since this was a realy cheap rate, I paid cash. We were to stay 7 nights, but only stayed 4. On Monday morning, I went to the front desk to let them know we would be checking out Thursday morning. I also talked to the desk clerk Wednesday. I was told he would send a request for a refund to corporate office first thing Thursday morning when we checked out because they cut checks on Friday. That was 12/27/2010. It is now 01/26/2011. I have called 3 times in January. and given the same story. 4 weeks have passed and still no refund. I called this week and a man named Jason said there was a refund request still sitting on his desk and that he hasn't even approved it yet. He looked and of course it had my name on it. I explained to him that $138 wasn't alot of money, but I wasn't going to forget about it either. Why when given 2 days in advance warning they couldn't of kept enough cash on location to refund me at check out makes no sense. I was also given a sarcastic OK, OK, OK whenever I attampted to explain i Was upset. The person couldn't of cared less. My problem is easily fixed. Give me my refund!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Loved this hotel”
Reviews.Author: vanillac2u
Reviews.Content: My children and I stayed here on New Years Eve this year. I was scared of getting another hotel in Branson...because I had AWFUL hotel experience at The Ramada and one of the Super 8's. However, this was totally different. The staff was so polite, the rooms were nice and the breakfast was great. I have no real complaints at all, except for the turn into the hotel....its hard to see, but other from that, it was a great stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great Service, very professional”
Reviews.Author: dmarkland
Reviews.Content: Hotel staff was professional, great service. Bathrooms were clean, towels were fresh. Breakfast was yummy, coffee was fresh. Fruit fresh as well

Reviews.Title: “Tops in its price range. A great value.”
Reviews.Author: souldad1
Reviews.Content: The rooms were clean and well maintained. The staff was friendly and efficient. The central location is perfect. The breakfast was much better than average. The price is low and the value is high. And best of all the bed was very comfortable. We will be back. - RG, Arkansas

Reviews.Title: “We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: SonataAmory_MS
Reviews.Content: Being our first trip ever to Branson, MO my wife and I decided to arrive in Branson with no advance reservations with any hotel. After a trip up route 76 from the Branson Landing area, we decided to stop at Howard Johnson and inquire what was in the area. We were greeted by a friendly and knowledgeable staff member that gave us information on local restaurant and attractions and her reccommendations. We decided to stay at Howard Johnson based on property and hotel appearance as well as pricing. After checking in, we found the room the be spacious, neat, orderly and up-to-date. The refrigerator, microwave and coffee maker were very nice. We noticed ice, drink and vend machines on eack floor level. The continental breakfast was good and enjoyed the breakfast while watching TV. The next day, we found Howard Johnson was within walking distance of several attractions and restaurants and outlet shopping stores as well as being in the center of the most popular attractions. The service was great! We came back to the room mid-afternoon for a short nap to find the room was just as though we had just checked in. We would definitely reccommend this hotel to our friends. We are making plans to stay at this Howard Johnson in late November or early December 2010. Branson is great!

Reviews.Title: “Great Trip!”
Reviews.Author: HuntParkMom
Reviews.Content: We chose this hotel because of the price. I wasn't expecting much, the check-in process was a piece of cake. Our room was clean and very comfortable. It was close to White Water and very easily accessible from the back way to White Water. It was very quiet and we got a good night's sleep. We ate breakfast the next morning and it was great. The breakfast lady that was on duty was wonderful and very helpful. They need another waffle maker due to the line of guest waiting to make one. My children are 8 and 7 and loved it. We will be choosing this hotel again for our stay!

Reviews.Title: “This was by far the best hotel with the most curtousy staff I have ever stayed at.”
Reviews.Author: tmcmains
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at many hotels the rooms were wonderful. The staff was excellent. The pool was great everone was friendly. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone. It was close to everything walking distance it was one of the best times me and my children have ever had. Mrs. Lee Jones was very helpful with everything we asked of her as far as directions. So I want to say Thank you to Hampton and thier staff for the good time while staying in thier Hotel. Teresa McMains

Reviews.Title: “Don't Stay Here - Very Dirty”
Reviews.Author: slclare
Reviews.Content: I don't mind an older hotel/motel, but there's NO reason for uncleanliness. We we were there for 2 whole days w/ no room service until my husband called the front desk. The only decent thing I can say about the place was the pool was decent. Other than that, I really don't have anything good to day. The place was just filthy - from the rooms, to the breakfast facillity, to the parking lot, to the elevators, everything JUST DIRTY!

Reviews.Title: “Won't stay here again”
Reviews.Author: luvdance46
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel after reading about it on their web page. No where on there does it tell you that there are 3 bldgs, each one separated by pretty steep hills. We were put in bldg C which was the furthest from the lobby and the street. They say they are within walking distance of restaurants, shows, etc. This may be true if you can deal with all the walking to get from the bldgs to the street that leads up to Hwy 76. By the time we got there, we were too tired to walk around. Also the TV in the room had terrible reception, the room to our door stuck, the lighting in the rooms is very poor and it took them 2 days to clean up raisins someone spilled in the elevator. On a good note, the staff at the front desk was very pleasant.

Reviews.Title: “OK place to stay”
Reviews.Author: iluvbranson
Reviews.Content: First let me say, the front desk girls were very helpful. The housekeeping-not so good! Never had enough towels or washclothes. Never any ice in machine. A real pain to have to go to the front desk after a long hot day at Silver Dollar City to get ice and towels. We did have ants crawling on the sink upon returning from the park one night. The bathroom ceiling was peeling pretty bad and chunks were falling off of the ceiling. The pool was very nice with two hot tubs and a kids pool. Location was great. Probably would not stay here again. Not many choices for breakfast, especially if you got there after 8am. Coffee maker in room, but never had any sugar or creamer.

Reviews.Title: “Don't stay Here”
Reviews.Author: darinduane
Reviews.Content: My family and I just got back from Branson, mo. When we got to the hotel the people at the desk were a little on edge. they did not tell me what was all included in the room all they said is please sign this and here is your key after a credit card was secured for payment and they had my name. I asked them why they charge 10 dollars for a refrigerator. they said because not every one needs one. well being on a budget I could not afford the extra so we stayed with the coolers we had.. ( not what I was expecting to do.) When we got to the room it had a funky smell to it not a god awful smell but a smell. the good thing is that the room was nice and cold when we got in the room could not have been happier about that. the room also needed a touch up by means of paint and a little maintenance. That night when we went to bed my wife and i could not be comfortable what so ever. what sleep we did get wasn't much and we both woke up with serious back aches. a little further investigation the next night. proved why. The beds were so broke down a normal person would have thrown them away or used them as fire wood. now what gets me is they spend probably $200-$300 per set. the least you could do is replace them every once in a while so guest will come back and want to sleep there knowing they will have a good nights sleep. In all honesty i would never consider another howard johnson hotel unless they really step up there game. from now on I will stay with la quinta inn, best western, or econo lodge have never had a bad experiance there!!!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Home Away From Home”
Reviews.Author: Sam31922
Reviews.Content: Our stay at Howard Johnson Motel in Branson MO. was wonderful. The service was excellent and the rooms were very comfortable and clean. The location had easy access to many points of interest. We loved the large outdoor pool which also included 2 kiddie pools and a playground. The breakfast provided many choices and was very good. The accommodations were just great and we will be going back when we visit Branson again..

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!!”
Reviews.Author: Theresa36
Reviews.Content: We stayed to the hotel for 4 days with small children, and LOVED it!! the front desk staff went above and beyond for anything we asked for. The air in the rooms was super cold, which was great because it was 98 degrees outside. The pool was fantastic great for little or big kids. Breakfast was ok for free. The only thing bad I could say is the last day we had a few tiny black ants on the dresser, and the tub was slow to drain. Would definately stay there again in the future great location!!!! Beds are soft if you ike that. Lots of pillows already in room.

Reviews.Title: “The warm, friendly, hospitable staff at this Howard Johnson's made our vacation seem like home.”
Reviews.Author: 425rhinelander
Reviews.Content: We highly recommend the Howard Johnson Hotel in Branson, MO. The location is close to everything and only one block off the main strip. It is very clean and the rooms are spacious. The staff is incredibly friendly, accomodating and made our stay exceptionally pleasant. We extended our 2 night stay to 6 because of the affordable rates and the warm, hospitable atmosphere of the staff and the entire Banson area. We had a wonderful time and hope to come back again next year. We loved our room with a view! Thanks Manya! :)

Reviews.Title: “Excellent facility”
Reviews.Author: SSCooper
Reviews.Content: My husband and I traveled to Branson for the first time and were amazed at the room we received for the rate they charged. The bed was the MOST comfortable bed I had ever slept in while traveling and the room was exceptionally clean and inviting. The shower head was terrific as many hotels have shower heads that just drizzle on you while this one was a full rain which made washing your hair easy. They have coffee in the room along with hair dryer and ironing board with iron. I will be back there to stay whenever I travel to the Branson area. Their manager Jay Wilson was kind and friendly and made sure our stay was pleasant. Thanks again Jay for making our trip so memorable. Steve and Sharon Cooper Huntington Beach, CA

Reviews.Title: “great service”
Reviews.Author: oklaraid
Reviews.Content: There were five of us in one room and still plenty of room to move around. The breakfast they have in the morning is plenty to start your day they had a great selection. The staff are very friendly. The hotel is only a block from the main road and all the attractions and shows.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice, clean...”
Reviews.Author: sambow1962
Reviews.Content: Had a very nice time. Rooms were clean. Enjoyed visit very much and will return!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: PonyV
Reviews.Content: I had a link to send directly to HJ but let it expire. I just wanted to let you know we enjoyed our stay very much. The 3027-A W. Highway 76 location makes it very easy to get where ever you want to go. The hotel is very nice and the people Great to deal with. I would not hesitate to stay the next time we are there and have recomended to friends.

Reviews.Title: “The best place to stay while visiting in Branson.”
Reviews.Author: TSMVAR
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed 3 nights in Branson at the Howard Johnson Hotel and were absolutely delighted with our stay. The staff were all friendly and helpful. The rooms were very clean, no odors like other hotels we've stayed in. The location is great with easy access without getting on the 76 strip unless you choose to. We definitely will stay here again and we will recommend this hotel to our friends.

Reviews.Title: “With Respect,This is a MOTEL,not a HOTEL.”
Reviews.Author: 3fishlock
Reviews.Content: This was our fourth visit to Branson & we were a little dissapointed to discover that this was a Motel & not a Hotel,as the pictures shown do not emphasis this on the Internet.Yet again the sheets on the bed had not been changed,since the last people had used the room,.The other drawback was the distance from the last block which is some way from the Breakfast Room.Overall,it was reasonable value for money!

Reviews.Title: “You can do Better than here”
Reviews.Author: chattykMidwest
Reviews.Content: We walked in and the lobby and breakfast area were super nice. The check in went smoothly all was good so far and then we went to our room. It was like stepping into a time warp taking us back to the 1970's. The room smelled bad, the furniture , linens, carpet, curtains were alll outdated. Can you say ORANGE, & AVODADO GREEN floral..The only thing updated in our room was the shower rod and curtain and the tub was scroungy in the bottom... I called to ask for a updated room only to be told we were in an updated room. Now that is bad.... The next day after being gone all day we returned to find a note on our door stating housekeeping did not enter because there was a do not disturb sign on our door that was totally not true so our room was left dirty and no clean towels. They finally brought our towels after I called took some time though and the front desk was rude when I requested them. There are sooo many nice hotels that you can stay at in that area and get a better price. We aren't going back to this hotel and I have made a complaint w/corporate..

Reviews.Title: “Don't Stay at Howard Johnson's”
Reviews.Author: Go24win
Reviews.Content: What a dump. Room smelled bad - had a strong musty/mildew oder. Had to buy an air freshner to try and get rid of smell. If you are handicapped or can't handle stairs, don't stay here. You have to go down or up stairs to get too any of the rooms. Had to put up with a banging noise in the ceiling every night. Think it was the water pipes. Walls are paper thin. Noise from shower in the room above us and beside us woke us up every morning. Room was not all that clean. The room, bed and pillows all showed wear and tear from use. There are a lot of better hotels you can stay in rather than this one in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Large spider on pillow case”
Reviews.Author: kmollick
Reviews.Content: Just arrived into hotel smelling off mildew. When loading suitcases into hotel out of corner of my eye seen a HUGE spider on the pillow case on the bed. We checked out immediatly. What a hole!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “First Time Fun”
Reviews.Author: tamnbenArkansas
Reviews.Content: This was the first time my husband & I have been to Branson. It was a very nice place. The hotel room was comfortable & the staff was nice. We will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Extremely Poor Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: jherndon721
Reviews.Content: We checked into the Howard Johnson in Branson, Mo on 8/9/09 and checked out on 8/11/09. After staying there the first night, the following morning my son had the sheet on his bed get caught on his suitcase and when he pulled it, the sheet came off the bed revealing a huge urine stain on the mattress. This meant that the mattress pad and possibly sheets had not been changed from the previous guests before we checked in. I contacted the fron desk immediately around 9:45am and was assured that somebody would either remove the stain or the mattress would be replaced. We left the hotel and returned around 4:30pm that afternoon and the room and mattress had not been cleaned. I contacted the front desk again and they seemed bothered that I had called twice and was assured that housekeeping was still working and they guaranteed that the room would be cleaned. We went out and saw a couple of shows and got back to the room just a few minutes before 11:00pm and found that the room nor mattress had been cleaned. I contacted the front desk for the third time and explained that the room had not been cleaned and the mattress was still stained. She told me that on the check list for housekeeping, it was checked that the room had been cleaned, at which point I asked her to come see it for herself which she denied. She proceeded to tell me that there was nothing that could be done since housekeeping had already left for the day, only after I got extemely persistent did she agree to bring me clean sheets and towels for the room. She got to our room around 45 minutes later and dropped the sheets and towels off but had to get back to the front desk. We had to flip the mattress ourself and make the bed and pile all of the used towels and dirty sheets and blankets ourself. The next morning when I asked the Asst. Manager Manya Wingard for a card for Jay Wilson whom I was told is the owner of this Howard Johnson due to a complaint of bad service we had received, she gave me his card and said Jay would be the one to talk to and she then proceeded to walk away without even attempting to hear what I had to say. I did contact Jay Wilson at the number on the card and Manya Johnson answered the phone. I asked her to have Jay call me back and explained to her why and even after explaining the problems we had, she did not offer any empathy whatsoever. I have not heard back from Jay Wilson, even though I explained to Manya that I would be filing a BBB complaint.

Reviews.Title: “Great location in Branson and Super Clean!”
Reviews.Author: Blue-april1993
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at Howard Johnson July 24-26, 2009 and we cannot say anything bad about our stay! The rooms were so clean, the staff went above and beyond to help us all weekend and it is a great location just off Hwy. 76 strip. It was very quite and peaceful just like a home away from home!! Our family will definately stay at Howard Johnson every chance we get!!

Reviews.Title: “Pleasurable trip and will come back again!!!!”
Reviews.Author: blossomArkansas
Reviews.Content: My extended family came to stay with you for a couple nights and was very impressed with the accomadations and would recommend this hotel to anyone and will plan on returning to your hotel. Thanks for a great stay and weekend!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Location with an awesome pool”
Reviews.Author: renay32
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Howard Johnson for three nights and I'm glad we did. We came in the middle of the week and we enjoyed how Branson was not overcrowded as it usually is on the weekends. My teenagers loved the swimming pool at this hotel. It was big and then there was a part for toddlers if you have little ones. The pool was sparkling clean and the pool area was very inviting. The room was good. The air was super cold, which was great considering it was summertime. The water pressure in the shower was outstanding and the best I have ever experienced at a hotel. The staff was very friendly and helpful. They offered continental breakfast that included biscuits/gravy. Overall, we had a nice stay and this hotel is not pricey so you dont feel as you have been robbed at the end of your trip.

Reviews.Title: “Our stay was terrible!”
Reviews.Author: jlbounds1427
Reviews.Content: When we first got there, we thought this was a nice hotel. The lobby area was clean and up to date. When we got to our rooms, it was a different story. It is very outdated and had a musty smell. I had two rooms and in BOTH rooms, one of the beds had blood stains on the sheets. One room had blood stains on the pillow and comforter. When shown to the assistant manager and lady at front desk. They acted like it was no big deal. They said they would 'take care of it'. We never were brought new sheets or comforter. They did try to bring us a new pillow, but there is 4 on each bed, so we didn't need a pillow. I am very disappointed and will never stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “good location but bad stay”
Reviews.Author: journeyg
Reviews.Content: the vending machines were not stocked and our neighbors had 2 dogs that barked ALOT. the hotel has 3 seperated building and our room was in the one farthest from the lobby and pool. I had to walk all the way to the lobby just for internet service. so nice w/ 3 kids in tow......ended up leaving a day early :(

Reviews.Title: “The Best Value for a Family Vacation!!!!”
Reviews.Author: anicholebacon
Reviews.Content: Being a single mother, summer vacations can be pretty tight...but I found the best value with Howard Johnson. The service was absolutely excellent, when we got lost on our way up there, the staff at the hotel were very helpful in geting us in the right direction and settled. Check in was very quick and painless, they got us checked in immediately and gave us a map of exactly how to get to our room, along with the specific times everything was open, i.e. the breakfast lounge, pool, ect. When we got to our room, we were very surprised at how spacious and clean it was! Everything was neatly placed, there were clean towels, the carpets were clean and there were no stains on the bed linens. The television and the air conditioner worked perfectly! The beds were comfortable and my son absolutely loved it! I think he may have liked playing at the hotel, rather than the entire vacation! The next morning is when we started our sight-seeing and trip-fun! We didn't realize when we arrived late the night before how close to everything the hotel actually was! It is not directly on the strip, it is off the way a little bit, but still within walking distance of everything we wanted to do! We were probably one block away from the Titanic Museum, Hollywood Wax Museum, and White Water!! There were also two ways to get to the hotel, one put you directly on the Branson strip, and the other was a more traffic free route that took you to whitewater and also to the strip!! The pool was also amazing! It was nice to have the kids pools connected to the big one, so that we could all enjoy swimming together, without being too far away from one another!! All in all, I have to say that the staff at the hotel were extremely friendly and helpful whenever we had questions, it was located in the perfect place, not too close to all the traffic, but not so far away that you have to drive forever to get to anything, and the rooms and amenities were superb. There is no doubt in my mind that this will be the hotel we stay at everytime we come to Branson! For the price you pay for two nights at this hotel, you can afford to have a great vacation without breaking your bank account. I loved it!

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and well worth the price. My children loved the breakfast!”
Reviews.Author: bunnynose78
Reviews.Content: We have young children and we loved the value of our stay here. Having the breakfast at the hotel saved us money and the kids loved the pool. Our room was clean and the air worked very well. We stayed very cool the whole weekend. We will definetly be returning!!!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect place to stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: BudF6F
Reviews.Content: My wife and I just returned from a trip to Branson, one of the absolute best travel destinations in America. Our stay at the Howard Johnson was very enjoyable. The location is perfect for access to all shows and attractions. The rooms are comfortable and clean, the staff friendly and helpful and the breakfast buffet (especially the sausage gravy) very good and hearty. We would recommend this property to anyone looking for a very nice and comfortable and convenient home away from home while in Branson. Bud S.

Reviews.Title: “We'll be BacK!”
Reviews.Author: Corajane
Reviews.Content: Midnight Check-in was very speedy. Cool, Clean, Fresh-smelling room. Great hot breakfast. Housekeeping services excellent. Stayed 4 days and was very pleased with all services. Pool and cabana very nice. Location is great for shows and shopping (3 outlet malls close by). Easy to travel and avoid major traffic by using access roads. Howard Johnson located just off the blue route. Have already made my reservations for my next stay at Howard Johnson Branson! Saw several shows but the best was The Twelve Irish Tenors.

Reviews.Title: “We were taken advantage of by this hotel, literally lied to our church group”
Reviews.Author: rifraffcaog
Reviews.Content: I booked this particular location only after visiting the propery in March we were taken on a tour of the property and were promised so many things at that time, there is a large grill in the pool area we were promised use of, we were promised large queen size beds with adjoining rooms facing the front office. However upon arrival were advised that our rooms were in the back and were in double beds. I advised what I was promised and was simply advised sorry they never told us. I was spending apx 1400.00 at this location with 6 rooms and 30 people I had provided a rooming list and complety taken care of our part, but when I arrived with our food to cook out on the grill, promised previously, we were advised that we would not have access to that grill. There were so many things that we encountered that as a group leader I was literally embarassed by this location and the behavior exhibited by their leadership. I was however offered a "free night certificate" sure that was great for me however that does not compensate my group in any way. This location literally lied to our entire church group. When given the opportunity to rectify this situation in anyway, even just apologize our phone calls were ignored and suddenly. Jay which I was advised was the owner of the property and Chip (the sales person I originally spoke with) and Danon who I finished everything up with on the phone were not available. When my call would go through to the sales staff I was told hey I'm going to take this to Jay and we will take care of you and then phone calls would never be returned. I was truly offended by their behavior and lack of concern or honesty. This left a bad taste in our mouth for the entire group and I am so embarassed that I ever recommended this location to anyone. Please consider greatly before participating with this location.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: jmm1985
Reviews.Content: Me and my 2 children enjoyed the stay! We were able to relax, enjoy the playground and pool, and just have fun!

Reviews.Title: “Howard Johnson's our oasis in Branson's Sea of Asphalt!”
Reviews.Author: 2boysKansas
Reviews.Content: After an exciting day at the local theme park our family was exhausted, that's when Howard Johnson's became our oasis in Branson's sea of asphalt! We were greeted with smiling faces and helpful suggestions concerning our stay in this comfortable, homey, atmosphere. Our teenaged kids headed for the inviting pool, tucked neatly at the curve of the entrance. We opted to relax in our quiet, clean room. Located just off the strip it is within walking distance to sight seeing adventures and numerous restaurants. We'll definitely stay again on our next trip to Branson! Thanks HJH! Sandy from Kansas

Reviews.Title: “Met All Expectations”
Reviews.Author: ksblonde54
Reviews.Content: We went in may , the room were clean, the staff was considerate . the motel is within walking distance of several attractions. we enjoyed our stay so much we are taking the grandkids back in july.

Reviews.Title: “Our stay was a real value in today's economy”
Reviews.Author: Gmanwashingtonmo
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Howard Johnson's in Branson was great. The rooms were very clean, the hospitality extended to my wife and myself ar friends was uncommon in a moderately priced hotel. Especially Brandi, who always had a pleasant smile, and always willing to answer questions. The pool area was clean and well kept and our room was also very clean. Thje air-conditioning worked well and the shower head was the beat. Even the continental breakfast was superior to other's I've had. (expecially the biscuit gravy) I will recommend this place to our friends who are having family reunion for about 40 people down in Branson. Thanks again, Gary & Cindy Grosse 716 W. Main St. Washington, MO 63090

Reviews.Title: “Way to go - - HO JO'S”
Reviews.Author: BigFootNixa_Mo_
Reviews.Content: Howard Johnson's is a reminder of growing up and all the times our family would go to the local Howard Johnson's restaurant in St. Louis and the motel's as we would go on family vacation. The Branson Howard Johnson's was a great stay and experience. As my wife and I travel we will always check out if there is a Howard Johnson's to stay first.

Reviews.Title: “What a Great Stay at the Howard Johnson in Branson”
Reviews.Author: kansas_girl_53
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful stay at the Howard Johnson and would strongly recommend to anyone traveling to Branson that this is the Hotel you should seek out. Rooms were clean, service was great, and the staff was very friendly and helpful. As for location, it is right off the strip, where we did our early morning or late nite walking.

Reviews.Title: “Great amenities, a very nice please and we will return.”
Reviews.Author: travelingmimitulsa
Reviews.Content: Love the location just off Highway 76 with easy access to all shopping. Exceptional pool and playground for children. Our room was very clean and neat and the bed was comfortable! Our breakfast was exceptional with lots of choices and a pleasant room with lots of space. We will return.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, great location, truly customer-focused management & staff.”
Reviews.Author: basstina
Reviews.Content: We stayed here on our first family trip to Branson over Memorial Day weekend. The hotel is in a great location -- close enough to walk to the main drag and featured attractions, yet very quiet and peaceful with trees on a quiet road. The front-desk staff was great at check-in -- had our requested room (non-smoking with queen beds) ready, yet were immediately willing to meet our on-site request to have a top floor (4 floors in each unit). We were always able to park right next to the elevator. Breakfasts were included and ample, with a very sweet attendant who said she loved her job, and it showed. The room was fine. Not luxurious, but a cut above the norm -- clean, free of any smells (I'm sensitive to smoke, mold, heavy fragrances -- none there). Our son enjoyed the pool, and we liked the convenience of the courtesy PC available for Web, e-mail and even printing right in the lobby. Since we used our cell phones while there for calls and even wake-up alarms, we didn't realize until the last day that our room phone wasn't working. We mentioned it at checkout, and the management was very responsive and said they would have been glad to fix it had they known. All in all, a great home base from which to enjoy our 3-day vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Wouldn't go back”
Reviews.Author: kitColorado
Reviews.Content: Branson Howard Johnsons May 13-May 15, 2008 We made a reservation weeks in advance and were given a dirty room in a building that was being remodeled and told there were no other rooms available. The room was in the last building facing a ditch with constructions workers everywhere. Elevators were filthy opened up to a pile of carpets. Ice Machines did not work. Soda machines were all empty. Requested another room and was told there were none available because there were no other rooms clean. After 2 nights we were finally given another room in a building that had already been remodeled. That room was fine. However the elevator and outdoor walk ways were filthy in that building as well and the ice machines and soda machines were not also working. The lobby and continental breakfast rooms were very nice. Why we were put in a room like that for 2 nights, I'll never know. We should have been moved immediately. I won't be staying there again. With so many hotels in Branson I'm sure that amount of money would have gotten us something much more comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Met Expectations”
Reviews.Author: speaker54
Reviews.Content: We were moved to Howard Johnson's by a time share promotion company after first being dissatisfied with our accomidations at the Settle Inn. Our room was what we expected in this price range. It had two double beds and a good amount of space. It was clean and well maintained. We had to walk a ways to the main building for the continental breakfast. (Is this a common theme in Branson - breakfasts in other buildings?) the breakfast was served in a nice room with the usual offerings of hot waffles, cereal, coffee, etc. Overall, it was a pleasant stay. Conveniently located near theaters and restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “Howard Johnson - The COLD SHOWERS”
Reviews.Author: teems4
Reviews.Content: My wife and I went with a group from St Louis to enjoy shows, shopping, and restaurants. Shows were GREAT, shopping was okay, restaurants were okay, the hotel HOWARD JOHNSONS was TERRIBLE. We were there for two nights and each morning we had NO HOT WATER for the shower! When I called the front desk, they had no desire to find an answer or assure us that it wouldn't happen again the next morning. Maintenance staff does not report to work until 8 a.m. Management doesn't show up until 9 or later. One morning is one thing, but twice in a row is something else. It all but ruined our trip!! If you want to enjoy Branson I would look hard to insure that you find a hotel that is kept up to date and provides the very basics, like hot water. Their marquee sign read "hot waffles", didn't mention no hot showers!! The HOWARD JOHNSON is in basic poor repair, very dated, and the rooms are anything but clean. Shows and Silver Dollar City was great, too bad they allow such poor accomodations in a great place to relax and be entertained!!

Reviews.Title: “Musty, lots of mold!”
Reviews.Author: bummedSouthDakota
Reviews.Content: It was not very clean, very dark rooms, very little light. There were bugs! Our stool was not cleaned the entire 4 nights we were there. The front desk staff was not friendly or helpful when we checked in. My brother and friend stayed there also and they had sore throats and respiratory problems within the first hour. It should have been reported to the Health Dept. No one should be put in rooms like that, it is a definite health hazard! The breakfast was disappointing also, the 'bus' people who were to eat in the next room were coming over and getting waffles. In the process they broke one of the waffle irons and went out with enough bananas and apples to supply them for a day! Overall we felt we really got ripped off, would never stay there again and we inform any one we know what our stay was like. It certainly ruined our trip to Branson, we had hoped for something much better from a Howard Johnson. We traveled 725 miles to spend what we hoped would be an enjoyable, comfortable stay. It was anything but that.

Reviews.Title: “full for queen”
Reviews.Author: kingcowboy
Reviews.Content: we paid for a room with two queen size beds. upon arrival they didn't have our room readty, we arrived at 4:30 and then they put us in a room that had 2 full beds and the hot water in the shower didn't work when we contacted the front desk nothing was done about it. they didn't even discounted the room due to the full beds

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This hotel was great! Close to the Titantic, Wax Museum, and every other attraction. The rooms were very clean. The pool was also very clean. The complimentary breakfast was also great!

Reviews.Title: “disappointed”
Reviews.Author: ton_amie
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at this Howard Johnson motel as part of a package. We opted to upgrade to this hotel through a reputable online Branson tourist service. We can't imagine anything worse than this motel. It was our first time to Branson. Our reservation was for three nights, but we shortened it to only two because the carpet in our room was absolutely filthy. It felt as if someone had spilled syrup ALL over it. Our shoes literally stuck to the carpet when we walked on it. We were also disappointed with the desk staff. We always enjoy asking the locals for their recommendations on events and restaurants, but the reception desk employees seemed to not even know the area themselves, and they seemed annoyed that we would ask them about the area. Another disadvantage of this hotel is that it is built on an incline. Everything slants..... so when you walk through the parking lot or park your car there, be ready to hike it. The only good thing about this room was that it was close to the main strip...only one block. This hotel chain truly disappointed us and we left there feeling that Branson as a whole is highly over-rated..and that we would NEVER stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Terribly Disappointed Do not Recommend”
Reviews.Author: frogtoes
Reviews.Content: The Howard Johson is not tourist friendly. My In-Laws took a tour package that included staying in this Howard Johnson. They arrived and checked in. On their way to the restaurant, my father-in-law slipped off of the curb, and hit his head. My mother-in-law yelled for help and help arrived. The manager of the Howard Johson wanted to have my father-in-law into the hotel and into his room *before* the ambulance came. My mother-in-law made sure they waited for the ambulance. When they did make it back to the hotel several hours later, the desk service was rude and unhelpful when my mother-in-law asked for assistance. The only ones to help were an independent food service that delivered food to the room later that morning. Our family and friends frequently journey to Branson and this Howard Johnson will *not* be patronized. They will be reported to the Better Business Bureau and whoever else.

Reviews.Title: “Wow!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this place to anyone in Branson for Vacation. Great service, clean, roomy, excellent breakfast, friendly maids, management and a pleasant stay. Very clean and orderly.

Reviews.Title: “loved the h.johnson”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: the howard johnson inn is the place to stay in branson.very friendly people.the rooms we had were very comfortable.not a lot of out side noises.close to just about everything.have stayed there for the past 5 years.

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting Pool!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Our room was fine, and the maids were very attentive, but ICK! This hotel had the worst pool I have ever seen. The water was green and cloudy, and there were dragonflies and band-aids floating in it, along with gobs of hair. We called to the front desk before going to the pool to ask about towels. The front desk said there were towels at the pool, but we couldn't find any. Don't swim here!

HotelInfo.Name: Howard Johnson Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 3027-A West Hwy 76, Branson, MO 65616
